AT.name: Mega Man™ 5
AT.description: Proto Man, einst Mega Mans treuer Kumpane, ist unerklärlicherweise Amok gelaufen und hat Dr. Light entführt. Mega Man muss jetzt in die Offensive gehen. Gemeinsam mit seinem neuen Begleiter Beat, einem Robotervogel, und dem zuverlässigen Roboterhund Rush muss Mega Man acht aufregende Level und ihre Superroboter bezwingen. Vor dem Entscheidungskampf musst du in Gravity Mans Level die Schwerkraft besiegen, die Verteidigungen in Stone Mans Level demontieren und die Wellen in Wave Mans Level reiten! Wenn du diesen Titel bereits auf deiner Wii™ erworben hast, führe einen System-Transfer von deiner Wii auf deine Wii U™ durch, um ein Upgrade-Sonderangebot zu erhalten. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Mega Man™ 5
AU.description: Proto Man - once the trusted brother of Mega Man - has mysteriously gone berserk, kidnapping Dr. Light and forcing Mega Man to go on the offensive. Assisted by his new sidekick Beat, a robotic bird, and his faithful robo-dog Rush, Mega Man must battle through eight thrilling levels and defeat the robot masters lurking within. Defy gravity in Gravity Man's stage, chip away the defences in Stone Man's stage and catch some surf in Wave Man's stage, before the final showdown! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: Mega Man™ 5
BG.description: Proto Man - once the trusted brother of Mega Man - has mysteriously gone berserk, kidnapping Dr. Light and forcing Mega Man to go on the offensive. Defy gravity in Gravity Man's stage, chip away the defences in Stone Man's stage and catch some surf in Wave Man's stage, before the final showdown! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Mega Man™ 5
BE.description: Proto Man, l'ancien frère d'armes de Mega Man, est devenu complètement fou et a kidnappé le Dr. Light. Mega Man est obligé de passer à l'action ! Accompagné de Beat, son nouvel oiseau cybernétique, et de Rush, son fidèle chien-robot, il devra traverser 8 niveaux périlleux gardés par des boss coriaces. Défiez la gravité pour vaincre Gravity Man, annihilez les défenses de Stone Man et survivez aux vagues de Wave Man avant le combat final ! Si vous possédez ce titre sur votre Wii, faites un transfert Wii™ vers votre Wii U™ afin d'obtenir la version améliorée à un prix spécial ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

ES.name: Mega Man™ 5
ES.description: El leal hermano de Mega Man, Proto Man, ha perdido la razón y ha secuestrado al Dr. Light, obligando a Mega Man a entrar de nuevo en combate. Junto con su perro robot, Rush, y un nuevo compañero de batalla, Beat, el pájaro cibernético, Mega Man deberá abrirse paso a través de ocho emocionantes fases acabando los robots jefe que se encontrará. ¡Desafía la gravedad en la fase de Gravity Man, destroza los obstáculos en la de Stone Man y doma las olas en la de Wave Man antes de hacer frente al combate del siglo! Si posees este título en tu Wii™, puedes realizar una transferencia de datos de Wii a Wii U™ y obtener una actualización a un precio especial. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

HU.description: Proto Man - once the trusted brother of Mega Man - has mysteriously gone berserk, kidnapping Dr. Light and forcing Mega Man to go on the offensive. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

IT.name: Mega Man™ 5
IT.description: Proto Man, un tempo fido compagno di Mega Man, è letteralmente "andato in cortocircuito"! Ha infatti rapito il Dr. Light e tradito, così, la fiducia del nostro eroe. Quest'ultimo non ha altra scelta: deve prepararsi ad affrontarlo! Con l'aiuto di due preziosi alleati, il fedele cane robot Rush e il nuovo volatile robot Beat, Mega Man dovrà farsi strada attraverso otto livelli pieni di azione e sconfiggere ciascuno degli otto Robot Master. Sfida la forza di gravità nel livello di Gravity Man, supera la fitta rete di difese costruita da Stone Man, solca le acque nel livello di Wave Man e... preparati alla sfida del secolo! Se possiedi questo titolo sulla tua console Wii™, effettua un trasferimento dati su Wii U™ per potere ottenere la versione ottimizzata a un prezzo speciale! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

NL.name: Mega Man™ 5
NL.description: Proto Man, de eens zo gewaardeerde broeder van Mega Man, is op geheimzinnige wijze doorgedraaid en heeft Dr. Light ontvoerd. Mega Man zet daarop de aanval in. Bijgestaan door zijn nieuwe hulpje Beat, een robotvogel, en zijn trouwe robothond Rush moet Mega Man acht spannende levels doorkruisen en afrekenen met de robotbazen. Weersta de zwaartekracht in het level van Gravity Man, hak de verdediging aan stukken in dat van Stone Man en trotseer de golven in het level van Wave Man om uiteindelijk de krachtmeting van de eeuw aan te gaan! Als je deze titel hebt gekocht op je Wii™, kom je in aanmerking voor een speciale upgrade-prijs als je je gegevens overzet van Wii naar Wii U™. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: Mega Man™ 5
NZ.description: Proto Man - once the trusted brother of Mega Man - has mysteriously gone berserk, kidnapping Dr. Light and forcing Mega Man to go on the offensive. Assisted by his new sidekick Beat, a robotic bird, and his faithful robo-dog Rush, Mega Man must battle through eight thrilling levels and defeat the robot masters lurking within. Defy gravity in Gravity Man's stage, chip away the defences in Stone Man's stage and catch some surf in Wave Man's stage, before the final showdown! PL.name: Mega Man™ 5
PL.description: Proto Man - once the trusted brother of Mega Man - has mysteriously gone berserk, kidnapping Dr. Light and forcing Mega Man to go on the offensive. Assisted by his new sidekick Beat, a robotic bird, and his faithful robo-dog Rush, Mega Man must battle through eight thrilling levels and defeat the robot masters lurking within. Defy gravity in Gravity Man's stage, chip away the defences in Stone Man's stage and catch some surf in Wave Man's stage, before the final showdown! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Mega Man™ 5
PT.description: Proto Man, em tempos o fiel irmão de Mega Man, enlouqueceu misteriosamente, raptando Dr. Light e forçando Mega Man a entrar em ação. Com a ajuda do seu novo companheiro Beat, um pássaro robótico, e do seu leal cão robô Rush, Mega Man tem de combater através de oito níveis emocionantes e derrotar os Robot Masters que aí se escondem. Desafia a gravidade no nível Gravity Man, destrói os obstáculos no nível Stone Man e domina as ondas no nível Wave Man, antes do confronto final! Caso já tenha adquirido este título para a sua Wii, faça uma transferência de dados da sua Wii™ para a sua Wii U™ com atualizações a um preço especial. Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: Mega Man™ 5
RU.description: Proto Man — брат и некогда самый близкий друг Mega Man — по непонятным причинам перешел на сторону зла и выкрал Dr. Light. Mega Man не может сидеть сложа руки и должен остановить обезумевшего брата. В пятой версии игры у Mega Man появляется новый напарник по имени Beat. В компании этого пернатого робота и верного киберпса по кличке Rush главному герою предстоит пройти восемь уровней и расправиться с противниками Robot Masters. Преодолейте силу притяжения на уровне Gravity Man, разнесите в пух и прах Stone Man и словите волну в гостях у Wave Man... Не забудьте, что впереди у вас — финальный поединок с врагом. Если вы приобрели игру на Wii™, вы можете передать ее на консоль Wii U™ и получить скидку на обновление игры до версии Wii U. Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.
